message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair.
The value is decreasing Bob, let's settle. I'll take my previous offer back.
Come on Alice, the value is dropping fast. I'll meet you a bit closer, but I still think I deserve more.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day!
